channel.title: Supposition, Hypothesis on Shriman Keshri

item.title: action = observation
item.description: Circle of time 13:34 quick capture: Time, Action and Observation. Future, Action, and Observation #action = observation Future and Action The future is hope, dreams, expectations, and predictions, comes to the present through action. There’s a catch though. Suppose there’s something I predicted, like what I will do next. Maybe I predicted that I would leave the place or do something, and I achieved that future through my action. But what if I predicted something over which I don’t have control?
